name: Battle of Semarang
description:
Battle of Semarang is a game with a side scrolling platformer genre that aims to introduce the history of the five-day battle in Semarang. This game was developed using Unity and the C# programming language.

The features in this game are:

  • Consists of 3 levels
  • Players can run characters and shoot bullets
  • The story of the history of the five-day battle in Semarang in Indonesian
